Detailed Description

ZCL Data Type Descriptor. Describes the Data Type length in bytes and Data Type kind (Analog or Descrete).

Field Documentation

uint8_t ZCL_DataTypeDescriptor_t::kind

Kind of Data Type. The #ZCL_DATA_TYPE_ANALOG_KIND,
!#ZCL_DATA_TYPE_DISCRETE_KIND or
!#ZCL_DATA_TYPE_COLLECTION_KIND should be used).
